name: cairo_clip_rectangle_list
purpose: Retrieves the current clip as a list of rectangles

return.description:
An array of user-space represented rectangles for the current clip(The status in the list may be CAIRO_STATUS_CLIP_NOT_REPRESENTABLE to indicate that the clip
   region cannot be represented as a list of user-space rectangles.
   The status may have other values to indicate other errors.)
